bilibili-search.description: B站视频搜索 MCP 服务，可以在AI应用中搜索B站视频内容。

env.SOLANA_RPC_URL: solana rpc url you can access

env.THEGRAPH_API_KEY: your api key from The Graph
your api key from The Graph

headers.Authorization: Bearer {{您的 CRIC物业AI Access Token}}

biel-ai.description: Query your product's documentation, APIs, and knowledge base.

env.MEMBASE_CONVERSATION_ID: your conversation id, should be unique

metoro-mcp-server.command: <your path to Metoro MCP server go executable>/metoro-mcp-server

headers.Remove-Me: Disable web_search_exa tool if you're just coding. To 100% call exa-code, say 'use exa-code'.

env.DAISYS_BASE_STORAGE_PATH: {Path where you want to store your audio files}

env.GOOGLE_MASTER_TOKEN: Your Google Master Token - see README.md
